messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Virus
messages.msgSnippet: Yeap and I ve just blocked her from coming in to my outlook express...in other words, don t download her from the server. Vaughnde Lee Missoula, Montana
messages.messageBody:
Yeap and I've just blocked her from coming in to my outlook express...in other words, don't download her from the server.
 
Vaughnde Lee
Missoula, Montana
http://www.stampinbookworm.eboard.com
-----Original Message-----
From: Johanna <saninocencio1@...>
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Monday, April 23, 2001 8:46 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Virus

None from you but I keep getting them from Linda Sternhill Davis.
 
Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!
----- Original Message -----
From: parrishml@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, April 23, 2001 5:03 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Virus

Okay -- is anyone else receiving the messages and attachments from
Irsdavis@...? I think that I have been able to get rid of the virus
here, but will someone please let me know if they get this attachment stuff
from me?

Thanks,

Laura
